title: Life On Pause- Level 1
description: Prequel to UnPaused-Final RoundShe found love right before it was shipping off to the army and he finally admitted it ten hours before deployment.  Two best friends, Ash and Cammy, finally come clean about their feelings for each other, but Ash is leaving for the army in the morning and neither know when he’ll be back. When Ash asks Cammy to wait for him, they make a promise that only the strongest love can withstand. Patience are tried and tested as Cammy grows into a woman Ash has never met. Convolution renders more set backs in their lives and when all seems to balance out, inexcusable hatred threatens to tear their worlds apart.
author: H.Q. Frost
